[#changelog]
# Revision History
:toc:
:toc-title:
:idprefix: changelog_

## Changes in 1.71.0

* Added aliasing constructors to `weak_ptr`
* Added `weak_ptr<T>::empty()`
* Added `enable_shared_from`, `shared_from`, and `weak_from`

## Changes in 1.65.0

* Added `atomic_shared_ptr`
* Added `local_shared_ptr`, `make_local_shared`
